Docs.summary: Base class for timed video and audio.

remarks.para: An represents one or more media assets. These are held in its property. Additionally, s include metadata, track grouping, and preferences about the media.
Because media assets such as movies are large, instantiating an will not automatically load the file. Properties are loaded when they are queried or via explicit calls to or .
